mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Bundit, William
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Nicholas Co., VA [Nicholas County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Bundit, William Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of left leg. Ball entered inner aspect at the union of upper and middle third of tibia passing outward and downward to exit a little below the inner of upper and middle third of fibula. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Ball from a shell. Result: Furloughed 1865/04/07. Deserted on furlough 1865/04/28. .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bundit, William
